name: VOGEL SALES COMPANY, Petitioner v. SANTANA PRODUCTS, INC., Santana Products Liquidating Trust, Michael T. Lynch, Sr., Michael T. Lynch, Jr., John A Carney, James M. Gavigan, William E. Jackson, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Vogel Sales Co. v. Santana Products, Inc.

parties: VOGEL SALES COMPANY, Petitioner v. SANTANA PRODUCTS, INC., Santana Products Liquidating Trust, Michael T. Lynch, Sr., Michael T. Lynch, Jr., John A Carney, James M. Gavigan, William E. Jackson, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of May 2009, the Motion for Leave to File a Motion to Quash the Respondents’ Brief in Opposition is denied as moot. The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
973 A.2d 412
VOGEL SALES COMPANY, Petitioner v. SANTANA PRODUCTS, INC., Santana Products Liquidating Trust, Michael T. Lynch, Sr., Michael T. Lynch, Jr., John A Carney, James M. Gavigan, William E. Jackson, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 28, 2009.
